com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.moves

Class RenderedSubmove

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.moves.RenderedSubmove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderBatch

    public final class RenderedSubmove
extends Object
implements RenderBatch
    Represents a Submove drawn on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderedSubmove

        public RenderedSubmove(Submove submove,
                       float lineThickness,
                       int circleSegmentCount,
                       boolean isNestedBatch,
                       Color submovePaint)
        Constructs a new RenderedSubmove from the Submove and the rendering settings.
        Parameters:
        submove - the wrapped Submove to draw
        lineThickness - the thickness of the line drawn
        circleSegmentCount - the number of segments for the circles between adjacent line segments
        isNestedBatch - a flag that specifies whether this Submove is being rendered in parent batch as part of a Move
        submovePaint - the color to paint this submove with

        Renders this batch.
        Specified by:
        render in interface RenderBatch
        Parameters:
        renderer - the object to render this batch to
